caseName: Guillory v. Morris

recap_documents.description: ORDER AND REPORT-RECOMMENDATION:  RECOMMENDED, that Defendants' Rule 12(b)(6) motion (Dkt. No.  56 ) be GRANTED in part and DENIED in part as described herein.  RECOMMENDED, that based upon the Court's review under 28 U.S.C. § 1915(e)( 2)(B), Plaintiff's claims for money damages against Defendants in their official capacities under § 1983 and his claim under Correct. Law § 610 be DISMISSED with prejudice.  RECOMMENDED, that Defendants be required to answer Plaintiff& #039;s Amended Complaint as to all claims with respect to which their motion to dismiss is denied by the District Court, and as to those claims sustained on this Court's review under 28 U.S.C. § 1915(e)(2)(B), if accepted by the District Court.  Objections to R&R due by 6/16/2014  Case Review Deadline 6/18/2014.  Signed by Magistrate Judge Therese Wiley Dancks on 5/28/14.  (served via regular mail on plaintiff)(alh, )
